consultation_summary.summary: Patient presented with complaints of persistent cough and shortness of breath.

subjective.comment: Subjective information provided by the patient.
subjective.chief_complaint: Persistent cough and shortness of breath
history_of_present_illness: Cough has been ongoing for 2 weeks.
Shortness of breath started a few days ago.
medication_history: Currently using albuterol inhaler as needed.
family_history: Mother has a history of asthma.
review_of_systems: Denies fever, chills, or chest pain.

objective.comment: Objective findings from physical examination and diagnostic tests.

assessment.comment: Doctor's assessment based on subjective and objective information.
assessment.risk_factors: History of asthma, family history of asthma

plan.diagnostic_plan: Order chest X-ray to rule out pneumonia.
plan.treatment_plan: Continue albuterol inhaler as needed. Start on oral corticosteroids.
plan.patient_education: Educated on proper inhaler technique and importance of adherence to medication.
plan.follow_up: Follow up in 1 week or sooner if symptoms worsen.

tests_to_be_taken.comment: List of additional diagnostic tests to be conducted for further assessment.

other_next_steps.comment: Other necessary actions before finalizing the patient's treatment plan.
lifestyle_modifications: Encouraged to maintain a healthy diet and exercise regularly.

prescription.comment: Comment on the list Medication details including names, dosages, frequencies, routes, durations, and special instructions.

medications.instructions: Use as needed for shortness of breath

additional_notes.content: Patient advised to seek immediate medical attention if experiencing severe shortness of breath or chest pain.
